Text: Wow!   Thanks so much for this!  I've been dying to see it for years.  Lupino did a magnificent job of maintaining the tension throughout the entire film.  Too bad there aren't more of her performances from the 1940s and 1950s available on TPB.  I can't believe "They Drive By Night" isn't on here (the torrent is dead).  We need more classic films on this site and less current, mediocre crap.
